Introduction

Kotoko is a Japanese singer under F&F Entertainment. In 2023, Kotoko participated in the SBS survival show "Universe Ticket" where she finished 7th place, securing her spot as a member of the South Korean project girl group UNIS.

Kotoko debuted as a member of UNIS on March 27, 2024, with their first mini-album "WE UNIS" and the title track "SUPERWOMAN."
